name: Nowy Widget for WordPress
author: nowy.io

sections.description:
The Nowy widget integrates with your website to display any posts directly from the Nowy social app into a single, customizable, and embeddable-anywhere feed from a designated business account. The Nowy widget helps travel bloggers, professional travelers, travel agencies, property management/marketing businesses, and related service providers build their own influential social community and connect to the largest supply of user content and experiences.

Brand New Concept for Custom layout

The Nowy Widget is auto-scalable based on the website’s layout and fits perfectly.

Where is the Nowy Widget for WordPress Plugin Most Useful?

Below is one small list of which areas you can start using the Nowy Widget Showcase for WordPress Plugin.

  • Travel Blogger’s social content showcase
  • Fashion/Shopping/Merchandise social content Showcase
  • Travel stories/experiences social content Showcase
  • Travel agencies’ products/services social content showcase
  • Photography Showcase
  • Product Showcase
  • Testimonial Showcase
  • Tour content Showcase
  • Travel-related service providers
  • property management/marketing businesses Gallery Showcase
  • Image/Media Gallery
  • Etc

Features of Nowy Widget plugin for WordPress

  • Perfect mobile responsive
  • Auto-scalable and perfectly fit in mobile or desktop
  • Posts amounts control
  • Filter for certain Nowy user accounts, Nowy Places, Nowy Hashtags#
  • Select topped posts at the plugin display
  • Multiple options for display order ascending/descending by Timestamps, Likes, Comments counts
  • Exclude certain users’ accounts posts
  • Exclude certain specific posts
  • Cross-Browsers Support (Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera, etc.)
  • No Coding Skill Required

Technical Support

We’re active for any support issues and feature suggestions. So, I hope you will love it. If you have any more questions,Feel free to contact us if you want any custom widgets for your site.

Like Nowy Widget for WordPress?

Don’t forget to rate us on [WordPress].
sections.installation:
From Your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins >Add New
  2. Search for Nowy Widget for WordPress
  3. Click on Install Now Button
  4. Click on Activate Now After Installed in the Backend
sections.faq:
Do I need coding skills for Nowy Widget

Not at all. No code is needed for using the Nowy widget. It is completely compatible with any WordPress website or PHP-based website. It is also compatible with Elemontor. Any user is only to copy and paste the shortcode to their website to display Nowy’s content from the Nowy app

Is there any Option for the content display?

Yes, of course. You can easily include or exclude any content on Nowy widget’s settings main page.

May I Face any Compatibility Issues with my Theme?

No. but, you can share your theme name with us if you’re facing compatibility issues.

Where can I ask for help?

Please reach out via the official email at info@nowy.io for any questions.

short_description: The Nowy Widget plugin allows you to create, manage, edit, and customize new Nowy app social content posts gallery layout.
